1.Title: Jade Soul, Frozen Heart
1.Description: The equipper's DMG ignores <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> of the target's <color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</color>. When the equipper activates an <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color>, the equipper's DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> and CRIT DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color> for 40s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
